course.title: Acheter et vendre les actions comme un pro
course.headline: Acheter et vendre les actions , finance, négociation d'actions, bourse
course.description: Trader depuis plus de 20 ans avec une expérience inégalée, vous apprenez dans ce cour la façon pour faire fructifier votre capital de manière professionnelle, c'est à dire pour gagner et de façon durable.C'est avec la plus pure tradition et la meilleure éthique financière que cet enseignement a été fait pour vous donner les meilleures bases et acquis financiers qui feront faire fructifier le capital que vous avez investi en bourse sur les actions.Ce cour se remboursera de part lui même en appliquant ses enseignements très clairs.

related.title: Morgan教你学习量化投资与程序化交易 (EP7:量化选股:基本面与技术面因子)
related.headline: - Quantitative Investing & Algorithm Trading
related.description: 讲者具有15+年以上在研究量化投资与程序化交易方面的经验，使用Multicharts与Trade Station的Easy Language超过12年，信息管理专业出身，也具备中国与台湾多种金融证照，包含证券分析师(CSIA)，对于如何结合IT技术与金融操作，有相当丰富的多年实务经历。过往曾教导许多家教学生，但都没有保存起来教学纪录，觉得有点可惜，因此结合过去多年经验，重新设计了本影音课程，本课程是给对于量化投资有兴趣的人一个入门的基本介绍，并且会教导你如何使用现有平台(Multicharts)，打造属于自己的交易武器与工具。对于初学者、进阶者在学习量化与程序化投资上会遇到的问题，希望都能透过本课程来解决，以及找到正确的方向学习成长。本课程将会分阶段逐步推出，每个系列(EP)下面包含若干子主题，因此可以针对自己想学的主题单独聆听。EP7本EP将讲述量化选股的两大主流:基本面因子与技术面因子，并且透过回测，实证两种因子的可用性与范例说明，希望能带给学员一个入门的观念建立。备注:若学员已经有熟悉或有兴趣的量化平台，本课程也能够提供一个完整量化投资的学习思路，因为所学习的知识与方法，并不一定只局限在使用Multicharts上，本课程的出发点，还是希望能够推广量化投资，讲者自身也涉猎了非常多国内外不同的量化平台与系统，因此虽以Multicharts为例，但背后经验与内容，其实万变不离其宗，都可以套用在其他平台上面。

related.title: LONDON ETF ( SAMPLE WATCHLIST - PMI, NMI AND UMCSI Reports )
related.headline: HOW TO PROFIT UP TO 200% FROM ETF's, WITHOUT TAKING ANY STOCK RISK
related.description: You will learn HOW TO PROFIT UP TO 167% FROM ETF, WITHOUT TAKING ANY STOCK RISK.The London etf strategy is one of the most professional strategies of our 7 deadly strategies series.You will learn how to trade everything in the world.How do hedge funds trades? setup charts and necessary options strategies to trade them step by step. And get them to your toolbox right away.The London ETF strategy course includes six lectures.Lecture 1. What is an ETF ? and Why Invest in them?We define the ETF concept. The advantages and disadvantages of trading them.Lecture 2. How to build an ETF watchlist ?How can we choose the right ones from 2,157 possible candidates. See the watchlist I designed for you and get the world in your hands.Lecture 3. the Four Main Business CyclesLearn how the stock market moves. How can we see the negative correlation between the sectors and trade it right?Lecture 4. How can we predict the future ?PMI, NMI AND UMCSI Reports. In this lecture, we GO PRO! We will understand the secrets of Billion-dollar hedge fund managers.See the most reliable near-term economic barometers available. And Learn to trade the reports.Lecture 5. Technical Analysis of an ETF. and Right Options Strategies to trade them.Which Indicators and settings should we use while we examine an ETF's movements. What is the right time frame of the option series.What is the right options strategy to trade them.Lecture 6. Real WORLD TRADE EXAMPLES WITH XLU - XLF - XLB and more..We trade XLU and close with 188.9%. Over $18,000 profit trade.We trade XLF and close with 123.1%.Over $6,000 profit trade.We trade XLB and close with a 167% profit.

related.headline: Comment augmenter facilement vos ventes et vos revenus
related.description: Les principes de la vente- Une bonne vente, et les qualités des vendeurs- Les bases de la vente- Motivations d’un client- Le temps de la vente- L’équation de la vente- Les étapes de la venteL’organisation du vendeur- Le fichier- Le pipe-line- Se créer un CRM avec Excel- Si fichier papier- La fiche client- Classement des clients- Planification de l’approche d’un clientLa sollicitation et prise de rendez-vous- Pourquoi solliciter- Principes de la sollicitation- La voix- Erreurs fréquentes- Préparation des appels- Où et quand appeler- Appel motivé ou non- Structure d’un script d’appelPréparation de la rencontre- Préparation matérielle- Préparation mentale- Attente avant la rencontre : qu’observerPrise de contact- La prise de contact en face à face : 5 secondes- Briser la glace- Introduire la rencontreDécouverte des besoins- Découverte du client- La découverte SOS- Comment écouter- Les questions à alterner- Ce qu’il faut éviter de faireLa reformulation- Pourquoi reformuler- Comment reformulerVendre la solution- Principes- Argumentation structurée- Argumentation matricielle- Spin selling- SOS simple- SOS solution globale- SOS comparatif- SOS comparatif avantages inconvénients- Questions pour avoir un OUIObjections- Étapes pour traiter une objection- Réclamation- Vraies et fausses objections- Techniques de réponseConclusion- Quand fermer une vente- Ne pas faire- Les techniques- Si le client refuse- Après l’acceptation du clientSuivi- Points clés du suivi

related.title: Morgan教你学习量化投资与程序化交易 (EP8:量化择时:打造自己的多空系统)
related.headline: - Quantitative Investing & Algorithm Trading
related.description: 讲者具有15+年以上在研究量化投资与程序化交易方面的经验，使用Multicharts与Trade Station的Easy Language超过12年，信息管理专业出身，也具备中国与台湾多种金融证照，包含证券分析师(CSIA)，对于如何结合IT技术与金融操作，有相当丰富的多年实务经历。过往曾教导许多家教学生，但都没有保存起来教学纪录，觉得有点可惜，因此结合过去多年经验，重新设计了本影音课程，本课程是给对于量化投资有兴趣的人一个入门的基本介绍，并且会教导你如何使用现有平台(Multicharts)，打造属于自己的交易武器与工具。对于初学者、进阶者在学习量化与程序化投资上会遇到的问题，希望都能透过本课程来解决，以及找到正确的方向学习成长。本课程将会分阶段逐步推出，每个系列(EP)下面包含若干子主题，因此可以针对自己想学的主题单独聆听。EP8本EP将把投资绩效的三大核心中，最后一块的择时(Timing Selection)做个说明，并且以范例讲解，要如何打造自己的一个择时系统出来。备注:若学员已经有熟悉或有兴趣的量化平台，本课程也能够提供一个完整量化投资的学习思路，因为所学习的知识与方法，并不一定只局限在使用Multicharts上，本课程的出发点，还是希望能够推广量化投资，讲者自身也涉猎了非常多国内外不同的量化平台与系统，因此虽以Multicharts为例，但背后经验与内容，其实万变不离其宗，都可以套用在其他平台上面。

related.title: Practical Trading on Financial Futures & Options Markets
related.headline: 2nd Edition Course - Interactive learning on financial markets!
related.description: This is our revised 2nd edition course with significant improvements as a step by step guide on how professionals trade the markets.  Experience practical interactive learning beyond classroom & theory!  While going through our course, you'll execute trades on a trading platform as we walk you through set ups each week! You'll learn debit / credit spreads using Crude Oil, Gold and conventions across different futures markets. We'll cover how to plan & monitor vertical spreads to start. Oahu Capital is a registered CTA (commodity trade advisor) and member of the National Futures Association (NFA). NFA ID: #0427607. Google: "Oahu Capital" or "Oahu Education" for both our websites

related.title: Social Media Finance Course: Fintech 2018 Trends
related.headline: Unlock financing for your start up or business with social media and fintech platforms. Insights into Fintech Marketing
related.description: Are you starting a business? Are you an entrepreneur?  Do you own your own business?  Every entrepreneur needs money to start and grow a business. A loan may not be your solution.  Do you know how to use your facebook friends, instigram, linkedin and other platforms on the internet to get money for your start up or your existing business?  If you don't this is the course you want to take.   Today there are numerous ways to fund to your startup and existing business.  I know how challenging it can be starting a business or wanting to start a business. I have done it three times.  You will need some sort of money to build a web site, hire programmers, marketing, digital marketing and more.   In this course, we will look at the latest funding trends on how other entrepreneurs just like you utilized social media, the internet and other platforms to access capital.  A bank loan; forget it.  Today, the internet is the new trend on how to get money for your business. This course will show you how to use social media to get money for your business. The course will teach you how to work your facebook friends, instigram followers and other social platforms to gain access to money for your startup or your existing operation.  I have personally used these strategies to fund my business. Also, this course will discuss how to implement application protocol integration, automation systems, and other configurations to enable you to maximize your social media presence.  We will provide you with:"Certificate of Completion" by Nicoya Tech and Lendinero on "Entrepreneurial Finance Course" The basics of digital marketing and digital finance

related.title: The Complete Forex Trader
related.headline: A practical application of the retail Forex market. A lock, stock and barrel approach to successful Forex trading
related.description: In this Forex Trading Course, I have shared my personal experience on how I developed THAT winning strategy. In this course, I will teach you How to Trade Forex with these easy to follow rules.

related.title: Simple Strategy for Swing Trading the Stock Market
related.headline: Use my favorite Technical Indicator and the Trading Strategy I've developed for Swing Trading Stocks
related.description: I've been a full-time trader of the Stock Market for almost twenty years, and I have developed a very simple and effective strategy for Swing Trading Stocks, ETF's - plus the Forex, Cryptocurrency and Commodity Markets.  My strategy combines both Fundamental and Technical Analysis, but relies mostly on Technical Analysis of stock charts. This course will concentrate on Technical Analysis, and you will learn everything I know about correctly reading stock charts in about 80 minutes!  By training yourself to read and correctly interpret the information charts give you, you will be able to predict which way a stock will most likely move in the near future.  Charts can actually give you a glimpse of the future, and are a must have tool in the successful trader's arsenal.In my Beginners Guide to Technical Analysis of Stock Charts here on Udemy, I covered fifty different technical indicators.  In this course, I teach the one indicator I use for all of my Buy and Sell Signals, and it's accuracy rate is about 80%. Two of the most important lessons included in this course are how to handle a false Buy Signal to keep losses to an absolute minimum, and when to lock in profits to maximize your gains. The trading strategy I teach in this course will provide you with a plan for entering and exiting trades with confidence. I look forward to helping you to become a successful Trader!Happy Trading! Tom
